definition: equivalent to either 是[shi4] or 就是[jiu4 shi4]

sentences.english: A high single plant yield is very important to population's yield in high-Density condition.
sentences.chinese: 在高密度條件下高的單株產量乃是高產的重要前提。

sentences.english: Character is one of the greatest motive powers in the world.
sentences.chinese: 品格乃是世上最偉大的行動力之一。

sentences.english: The definite diagnosis of primary cutaneous cryptococcosis was confirmed by pathologic findings and fungus cultures.
sentences.chinese: 確切的診斷乃是基於病理診斷及黴菌培養。

sentences.english: Maundy Thursday served as a preparation for the feast of Easter about to follow.
sentences.chinese: 濯足日乃是爲著緊接著到來之復活節筵席所做的預備。

sentences.english: The controversies are those about matters as to which there is no good.
sentences.chinese: 最激烈的爭論乃是關於正反兩方都無充分證據的事物。

sentences.english: Thus, characteristic of aesthetic psychology is exceeding utility and non-logic.
sentences.chinese: 由此可以引出審美心理的特徵乃是超功利與非邏輯。

sentences.english: Hope can make you young, for hope and youth is brothers.
sentences.chinese: 希望會使你年輕，因爲希望和青春乃是同胞兄弟。

sentences.english: Virtue is a jewel of great price.
sentences.chinese: 美好的品德乃是無價寶。

sentences.english: We humans are part of a circle.
sentences.chinese: 我們人類乃是大自然循環的一份子。

sentences.english: It was Christ that spoke through Melchisedek, the priest of the most high God.
sentences.chinese: 那藉着至高上帝的祭司麥基洗德說話的乃是基督。

sentences.english: This situation, as Robert quickly comes to understand, is a tricky and potentially dangerous one that involved the entire town.
sentences.chinese: 羅伯特很快便了解到這一切乃是涉及全鎮的陰謀。

sentences.english: Our calling, is to worship, honor and serve God.
sentences.chinese: 我們所受的呼召，乃是去敬拜尊榮，事奉神。

sentences.english: David understands that God's forgiveness is the best thing we can ever experience.
sentences.chinese: 大衛瞭解到蒙主赦免乃是我們可經歷到的最好的事。

sentences.english: Who ever that wants to serve the Lord must serve him in spirit and truth.
sentences.chinese: 誰曾想所事奉的乃是主必須爲他要用心靈和誠實拜他。

sentences.english: Their speaking was a way of prophesying, the kind of prophesying emphasized in the New Testament.
sentences.chinese: 他們的說話乃是新約所強調的那種申言。

sentences.english: In the final analysis, then, Liu Xie's philosophy of literature is a philosophy of humanity.
sentences.chinese: 因此，歸根到底，劉勰的文學觀乃是一種人生的哲學。

definition: to be bound to/to be sure to
to offer (tribute)/to present respectfully (to superior, ancestor, deity etc)/to esteem/to revere/to believe in (a religion)/to wait upon/to accept orders (from superior)
that being the case/then/in that case
to be called/to be known as
